front.title: Automatic discovery of RFC 5626 Edge Proxies

abstract.t: [RFC5626] (commonly known as 'SIP outbound') defines mechanisms that permit SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) UAs (User Agents) to maintain multiple connections to a registrar or proxy via multiple Edge Proxies, known as the outbound-proxy-set. Discovering the URIs that make up the outbound-proxy-set is left to configuration or future discovery mechanisms. This draft defines a simple discovery mechanism that enables UAs to discover the URIs of all the Edge Proxies in the outbound-proxy-set without requiring additional configuration on the UA.
